评论概述: Awesome and secure- a great dupe!
评论详情: Detailed review ahead (girl, be ready for a novel)….I have to say first that I am a die hard lululemon fan, but I work as a choreographer every summer for a well respected theatre camp. Last year, all my lululemon running shorts and most of my tanks were on their last leg. I had heard about these online and wanted to give them a try as an alternative for summer camp, as I could spend less and buy more colors to mix and match. WOW! For the money you can’t go wrong.  I purchased the white, black, denim blue, and jade green tanks and the matching mesh lined high waist running shorts. I am 5’7 and your typical smedium 32dd. I ordered medium across the board. I rapidly lose weight over the summer due to the heat and the exercise. I feel these will fit me if I fluctuate as low as about 15 pounds lighter.  Tanks- These are fantastic. They are not for super high impact, but for lower/ medium impact dance they are great. I can also see myself wearing these all summer as loungewear or with shorts. If I sized down it would’ve given me more cleavage than I wanted. I may try taking in the liner a bit for more security near the end of summer when I’ve dropped weight. Great lululemon dupe. Comfortable and flattering. The ONLY con I have is that the size varied slightly by color. The black and white fit more snug (which I preferred). The denim blue and Jade green fit a little looser as you can see in the side profile picture of the denim blue set.  Shorts- these are great dupes as well! The back pocket completely fits my iPhone XR. The side pocket is super secure and deep. The shorts are slightly longer in the back. The high waist is pretty small and includes about an inch of tighter elastic. I personally like this for camp so my walkie doesn’t pull them down, but if you have more of a square figure it may pay to size up. The tank meets right where these shorts start. My only complaint on these is sometimes the way they lay can look a bit funky in the crotch area, but nothing too major. The colors all looked great. I wore the white with red underwear and it didn’t show through where the mesh liner was.  As a set- Black is perfect and what you’d expect. The white is a CRISP white. Like, it made me pull out my teeth whitener white. It’s beautiful, but literally my Snow White OPI nail polish even looked a tad dingy in comparison. The Jade green shorts were a slightly different shade than the tank. It was not enough for my husband to notice without telling him. For some reason it looks a lot different in the photo but they’re more similar in person. The blue is a pretty darn close match. If anything, the band is slightly different due to the different material. It’s not a dealbreaker for me, as I plan to mix and match a lot  Final thoughts- I love them. I sent both my sisters the links to them, I will live in them all summer, and I will be buying more sets in a variety of colors. Lululemon who?
Love these shorts. Fit is good,comfortable. Lululemon dupe. Great quality. I can fit a lot in that hidden pocket. Washes up well. Voight 3 more pair.

评论概述: The liner is looser and these are SHORT
评论详情: I am 5'2", 140lbs generally a Large bottom. Got these in Medium Wine Red based on reviews and intending to wear them high waisted. They do feel a bit tight around my waist (34in), and they are SHORT worn like this... I cannot imagine a taller person or long legs!! Worn high-waisted these have about a 2in inseam, and it rolls up sometimes when I've been active a while which is really annoying. The back pocket is roomy for my phone (Samsung s10) to have a snug fit and doesn't feel like it flops around when I'm active. The front pocket is on the left side and suitable for a house key or room card or lip balm or something small. The mesh is light and these are light wicking. The liner is loose.... like quite loose. If I had a Large, I would have been swimming in it. So not great if you don't want to wear undies with these! The fabric is a sporty, lightweight fabric as expected and food for watersport as well as an alternative to swim bottoms. If they get wet (red wine color) it's noticeable from sweat or other liquids. The waist band is a softer stretch fabric and feels nice against the skin and nonchafing. These are very well made and high quality shorts. The color is a true wine red and very pretty.

These shorts are identical to lulu lemon shorts at a much less price.  They fit true to size. I am usually a small and the small fits me perfectly. They wick sweat. I wear them to work in the yard regularly and just around the house because they are so comfortable. The only difference between these and the lulu shorts is the small tiny logo on the back. I love them so much that I have them in at least 4 colors. My daughter is a lulu snob and asked me “when did you get those lulu shorts”. Will order again in other colors. So far I have pink gray black and blue. They are not see through, they are great for working out and the zipper on the back is a great quality.

First off, I would like to say that I like these shorts. They are really comfortable, I like that it has the zipper pocket in the back as well as the little elastic pocket in the front of the waistband, and for the money I’m very happy. So, functional, comfortable, good price and seeming good quality (I’ve had mine about a month and use them at least 1-2x week).  The reasons I wanted to write this review: - “high-rise” vs “Mid-rise:” they don’t provide the coverage I wanted for my midsection (I had hoped to rock a crop top with the shorts the same way I wear crop tops with my high waisted leggings. They do not provide high-rise coverage, and my opinion. In the photo I took here, I pulled the shorts up as high as they were comfortably go. That looks like mid-rise at best to me.) - I don’t like the look. I bought two different styles of high-rise workout shorts off Amazon, and I dislike the fit of both waistbands. This waistband is comfortable, but visually I dislike the look.

I was initially worried these shorts wouldn’t measure up to the Lulu brand, but I was so wrong! The material is identical to Lulu’s—soft, durable, and high-quality. The inner lining is a game-changer: not too tight like some Lulu liners can be, making them super comfortable. These shorts stay in place during workouts, fit perfectly, and don’t ride up. I’m beyond impressed and can’t wait to wear them for more workouts. The colors match the pictures provided. I have two colors! Purple and orange! Highly recommend!
these shorts are my favorite! they are comfortable and functional. i love the high waste as it holds everything in. they are super flattering.

These running shorts were like a mystery box of surprises! Starting with my usual size, small, I felt like I was trying to squeeze into a pair of sausage casings. But fear not, dear reader, for I sized up to a medium, and it was like finding the Goldilocks zone—just right! Sure, they're a tad loose around the waist, but they still stay up no problem.  The color? True to the Amazon post, which is always a relief. And let's talk about that waistband—it's softer than a cloud! The leg material isn't exactly silk, but hey, it's still more comfortable than some of my Nikes from the past.  Now, about the price—can we talk about a steal? Just under $20, and they're giving my pricey Lulus and Athleta shorts a run for their money! Plus, that zipper pocket on the back is a game-changer for stashing my keys or emergency doggy bag stash.  They're comfy, they're stylish, and they're ready to take on any challenge.

I love their products.  I have the sports bras in two style and their “bike” shorts and  leggings in multiple colors.  These shorts are great they have a back pocket it isn’t my favorite but definitely something different to try. They are stretch and true to size, the material dries fast.
Bought these shorts for a 2 week tropical trip and it was my most worn item. Comfortable, cute, and quick drying in 80%+ humidity. I only wish it had hip pockets.

I love these so much I have purchased 4 different colors. The material is a nice thin material- good for summer and warm days. The color options are great! These were my go to this summer when golfing and just hanging around the house. They are very comfortable with a high rise. The high rise helps cover my belly and keeps things tucked in. They truly make me feel better when wearing a crop tank or a shorter shirt while golfing & staying cool. I am 145lbs 5’2” and ordered a M. I will continue to live in these in the summer.

评论概述: Love but they will wear out

I’ve had these for about a year now and they definitely show some wear. I do wash and dry them and I’ve worn them a lot. Compared to lulu shorts, they don’t last nearly as long. Overall, I would buy again.
Very comfortable highly recommend

I ordered Medium and they fit me great!. Very comfortable and the top part has a stretch range. I was looking forward to running in them. Both runs at different weeks, I got bad chafing. I’m so disappointed because I thought they’re made for running so I was mislead on that but I’ll still wear it on a normal day that doesn’t involve running because it’s that comfortable. Material feels good. Waist area is thick like double layered swimmers. On the bottom leg part is polyester material.

Love these and ended up buying multiple pairs!  I am normally a medium though (but sometimes a large); I bought the medium and they were too tight. Got the large instead and those fit perfectly; so you *may* need to size up.

They are comfortable and have a zipper in the back where you can place you  phone cards money etc. I did not like that the color in the waist part changed with washes and now is different from the rest of the short. It is breathable and thick enough

I had purchased in a medium and they fit well other than the backside area was a bit large and  bloomed outward.  Woukd recommend a small because of it if in between sizes.  Nice fabric through and great construction

I’m pretty picky when it comes to running clothes. Especially shorts. They’re moisture wicking, a good thickness so no see through and the color was exactly what I thought it would be. They’re don’t ride up or fall down and fits perfectly. Have at least 3 of these so far. 10/10 recommend. They’re functional and affordable.

I’m 5’3” and 135 with athletic legs. I prefer a size medium in most workout shorts, and the medium fits to my preference. These shorts cover my butt and aren’t tight, which is what I wanted for running. The back pocket fits my iPhone 16 Pro and the front pocket is perfect for a key fob.

I really love these shorts. They fit perfect. The back zipper fit my phone and Gu’s great without a lot of movement or jiggle. Love the high waist. My only complaint is for long runs on a super hot humid day they get heavy from the sweat. Wish the material was a tad bit lighter. It didn’t stop me from wearing them. I would buy definitely buy another pair.

Nice shorts with good inner liner. The waist was a bit tighter than expected relative to the size of the rest of the short, but not enough to return them. If you have a small waist these are for you. Tight waist line. Does not cinch waist but good quality of material. Pretty wrinkle resistant

评论概述: They seem like a big name knockoff
评论详情: They fit and look just like a big name athletic knockoff. I love them!
Love everything about these shorts. Comfy and a great length. Fit is perfect.

评论概述: I am sure I'd love this in a few months.
评论详情: I am currently almost 3 month's postpartum and I ordered these in a medium due to the large waistband in hopes it would give me support in the midsection as I begin my workout journey again. Unfortunately, it didn't meet my expectations or maybe those were unrealistic. The waistband is more of a midrise and kind of squishes me around the middle. I would prefer these to be higher rise - at least covering my belly button and with less compression in the very top part of the band where it kind of sinks into my waistline. I could probably size up to a large if I really wanted to. I LOVE the color of the Ink Blue style - it was gorgeous! And I liked the fit in the legs as they are meant for running, it was very flowy. I will keep these on my "Save for later" list and maybe once I am down a bit more in my postpartum journey I will give theses a second try. For reference, I am 5'5" and currently 140 with a long torso. I carry most of my baby weight in my belly, love handles and my bum (hopefully I can keep some of that ;-)).

Good quality and love the thick high waisted waist band. The waist band is pretty tight, but I prefer it that way. They are so cute, and soft.  I had bought another brand in a large they fit great saw these were similar style and had fun colors. I’m on the fence about these. I usually wear under armor athletic shorts and while these are cute, they’re not at the top of my list.  I have fairly muscular legs and some shorts tend to be tight around my thighs, these aren’t. They give room for being flexible without worrying about ripping them BUT the waist band is odd. It doesn’t fall in a natural spot along my waist, too low to sit at my waist, but higher than low rise jeans. Just awkward. I have to pull them up, which makes them super short or push them down, which makes them fit weird.  I ordered an XL, and I’m generally a L to XL in all of my shorts with room because I don’t like them super tight. The waist on these is a little tight, just enough to be annoying, but not enough that the next size up would fit. They also don’t have a functional pocket.  I’ll keep these for the gym, but definitely wouldn’t buy another pair.

These are a great addition to the ward robe.  They fit true to size and the color is exactly what was shown.  They are durable and thick enough to not be see through.  They are great for workouts and just everyday.
Super comfortable elastic waist. I wish they were slightly longer but I like them enough to get 5 pairs, lol.

Update: I’ve washed them (cold) and they have shrunk. Very small and uncomfortable, I constantly need to pull them down. Can’t wear them for any type of exercise and don’t feel comfortable wearing them out of the house.  Original review: I was hoping for a loose, lined short with a high/low style. This kind of meets that? NOT high-waisted, waistband falls below my belly button. The lining fits snug and the shell is looser but it feels like my thighs are eating them when I move. I definitely wouldn’t be able to wear these while running and they scrunch up a bit while doing strength training. I’ll probably end up wearing them as casual shorts but they won’t be my first choice. For reference, I’m 5,7 and 150, typically a size 6 or medium; I have hips and a butt. I ordered medium but wish I had gotten large (however I’m not even sure that would help as I think the cut just isn’t right for me)

评论概述: LOVE the color, but puffs a little on the sides
评论详情: Bought these on Prime Day. Compared to other notable athletic brands, i think these are high quality for the price. The pictures aren't great to show the fit, but i wanted to show how vibrant the pink is. I LOOOOVE the color. I bought two different pairs both pink, but different shades of pink. This is the "Bright Pink" color. The other pair was "Rose Red". As some have mentioned, the waistband is pretty tight fitting. I dont mind it, but when I'm just wearing the shorts and my sports bra, it definitely cinches in at my waist, with just the slightest bit of skin bulging over. (the worlds tiniest muffin top) It doesn't bother me enough to not wear them. The other thing that makes the fit a little weird, is that while the waist is tight, the built in briefs are pretty dang loose. And i am not a pancake booty. I have some buns, and the briefs are loose on me. It causes the material where the shorts meet the waistband to give just a little puff thats not the most flattering. I'd rather it lay flatter than poofing out. Anyway, this could all be different with one size up. I'm 5'4" 127lbs and bought size small. Maybe a medium would eliminate the issues, but c'est la vie. BUY THEM!

These are my FAVE! I have multiple colors. I will say they are on the shorter side, as I got that length- but for working out I wanted something that kept me cool, didn’t show my nooks and crannies, and was also cute! These are it. They are breathable, elastic at the waste, built in undies to hold it in, perfect! They hold up to strength training and boxing. I will say there’s a gap in the back by the butt, not a hole per say but if you mess with the fabric you can open, not to show anything inappropriate by any means- I call it a breeze area lol 😂 I found it by accident. It won’t show anything during squats or workouts; just an odd find. Didn’t stop me from buying multiple pairs. The red is vibrant and the black has not faded in the wash!

I ordered the Maroon and they are as pictured. I’m 5’7 , typically a size 12-14 and ordered the XL. They fit perfectly not tight or constricting. Fits perfectly around the waist and loosely in the legs LOVE THEM! Must buy. I’m grabbing them in all the colors. When they go back on sale.

I love these shorts. Theyre super cute but if you have large thighs then youre gonna chafe. I used them for running and at first they were fine but as soon as i started getting sweaty thats when it started to hurt.  Other than that I love them. Ill probably just wear them as casual shorts instead. I also do suggest sizing up seeing as the elasticity of the waist is a little tight but it does help with tummy control. I personally sized up from medium to large and I am so thankful I did.

评论概述: True to size and high end buttery athletic feel to them!
评论详情: Update - been a runner all my life and did a 10 miler and my phone being back there did not bother me at all  Since having kids i prefer to run with a phone now because the location is more accurate than the air tag i used to use. Came across these and I’m very happy with them so far - haven’t ran in them yet but comfort and fit is great.  I’m 5’1, 115 lbs and i got the small and medium to see. Small fits like a glove especially with my iPhone in there i feel like i could do a ten mile run without it bothering me. High waisted and doesn’t make me feel constricted in midsection at all. When it comes to fitted shorts I’m really picky about the smooth “buttery” feel of athletic shorts and these feel just as good as any other high end ones  Though they fit like a glove i also like the fit of the medium because i like my clothes more “comfy” fitting, however my phone moves a little more in it so I’ll probably keep the small instead.
I love these shorts. I have several of them. However, they shrink if you dry them in the dryer, and other athletic brands I am a Medium, but in this brand I am a Large. So I would suggest sizing up!!
This the the best sport shorts that i have, i always use it, its very comfortable. i love the different pockets, the bag one is enough to put my phone in it (13 pro max). And its very breathable!😍

These shorts are on the shorter side. I loved them because the back has a pocket big enough for your phone and some gels. There’s even a little front pocket! They are very light weight. I wore them for my marathon and they were cool and didn’t chaff me.

评论概述: The inner lining is soooo uncomfortable
评论详情: The waist was tighter than I’d like. Color is cute and fabric is nice. The lining is huge and kept riding up so I cut it out. Should have just returned.

The waist band and brief fits fine. But the legs fit weird. The split hem is sewn shut. Even when I ripped that seam, you still don't get the range of motion with a good running short. If you take a decent sized stride, the legs will slide up and you might as well be wearing buns.  I'll keep them (since I ripped the seam), but only for lounging around the house and maybe errands. Definitely no workouts.
Comfortable

评论概述: Not bad, but I’m not as impressed as others
评论详情: I’ll qualify this review by clarifying that there are very few pairs of running shorts that I’ve owned that has checked every box for me.  Pros- The high waist on these is fantastic Great pockets Pretty color Breathable & quick dry Comfortable  Cons- These shorts don’t move with me. The hem tends to roll up with movement. Since the shorts already have a short inseam, I don’t feel like I can wear them out in public. It’s totally fine for my purposes since I bought them for home workouts, but I’m sure most people expect to be able to wear them out and about.  Fit- I’m normally a 6/8 or M in pants and shorts. I sized up to a L based on others’ comments, and I’m glad I did since I don’t like my workout shorts to be tight.
Lululemon dupes! Great price and good quality. They are super comfy and I have gotten so many compliments.

Great shorts for 1 month post pregnancy at 116 lbs and 5’4”. I used to be an extra small but had surgery, have sensitivity/swelling on the area, and my weight shifted places. Love that it’s not too tight or too revealing on my back side, and it doesn’t wrinkle which is a bonus for me. The zipper pocket in the back and pocket in front are small- at most you can fit a car key/debit card and a phone, but overall a good deal for the price.

评论概述: Cute but a bit short for thicker booties
评论详情: Love them. So comfortable. They are a bit short and ride up like any other short on a thicker person
So cute and comfortable. Quality is great. One of my favorite pairs and I'm normally a Lulu gurl

I’ve bought two pairs of these: white and black. I wear these to the theme parks and they are perfect! Light, airy and dry fast after going on rides that get you wet. I also keep my theme parks annual pass zipped in the pocket that is in the back waistband. The waist band has good stretch; it holds you in but not too uncomfortably.

评论概述: Very nice shorts, a bit pricey
评论详情: Nice shorts similar look to lululemon I saw someone wearing. I don’t own any so I can’t compare except the look. I love the pink and blue colors I bought. The waist is somewhat compressing seems a bit tight for a medium.  There are no pockets. They are very lightweight and the built in liner is great. I wore them hiking in 90 degree heat and they were pretty good no sweatiness and didn’t ride up much at all. Wish they were cheaper for being Amazon.
